K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:371b-1: a'ary'a bee barta tsakra n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:386a-11: ji ltar legs par gnas she na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:386a-12: lus 'di ni rtag tu lus ma yin pa zhes de ltar legs par gnas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:386a-13: lus kyi chos nyid kyis thog ma dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-13: lus kyi 'du byed gang brjod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-14: de dag lus nang gang na'ang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-15: phyi rol ma yin phyi dang nang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-16: gang du yang ni byung ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-17: chu shing phung po snying po med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-18: rtag par shin tu snying po med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-19: ma skyes shing ni ma 'gags pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-20: nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-21: 'di ni mngon sum gyur pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-22: byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-23: bsam gyis mi khyab pa des de na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-24: rang rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-25: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin spyod yul du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-26: chos rnams thams cad rnam par shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-27: rnam shes sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-28: 'di ni mngon sum gyur pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-30: log pa yin par rnam par shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-31: de yis 'du shes rnam par shig pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-32: chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-33: shes pa shes pa ma yin shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:414b-34: thams cad du yang de mi chags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-2: rnam par shes pa sgyu ma 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-3: ming dang gzugs su gang brjod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-4: de ni dgongs te brjod pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-5: rtag par shin tu rang bzhin gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-6: de yi dngos po grub pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-7: skye mched yod pa ma yin par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-8: skye mched 'di dag bstan byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-9: de dag sgra yis brjod pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-10: de dag gzod nas stong pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-11: sngon chad de yi reg pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-12: skye mched brtan nas byung gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-13: gsog dang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-14: de ni de yin rnam par bshig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-15: reg pa rnam par rtog las byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-16: de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-17: ngo bo nyid kyis reg pa'i chos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-18: gang yang gnas pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-19: 'di ni nor par reg pa zhes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-20: reg pa'i rang bzhin mngon sum gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-21: rig pa dben pa phun sum tshogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-22: rang rgyal ba zhes brjod pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-23: tshor ba rnam gsum stong pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-24: ngo bo nyid kyis zhi ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-25: chu bur 'dra ba snying po med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-26: shin tu gsog dang gsob tu shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-27: sred pa thams cad yang dag chad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-28: sred pa med pa'i chos nyid shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-29: sred pa zad pa rjes su thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-30: rang rgyal ba zhes brjod pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-31: len pa len pa ma yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-32: stong par de yi rnam par bshig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-33: de ni dngos por grub med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-34: smig rgyu la ni chu bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-35: de yi srid par 'du shes gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-36: de yi 'du shes sdig pa can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415a-37: de yi de ni rang bzhin gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-0: rtag par shin tu dngos med @415b shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-1: de la skye ba thams cad med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-2: de la 'chi ba yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-3: de ni nam yang gang zhig tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-4: skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-5: rkyen rnams 'di dag shes nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-6: de ni gang la'ang mi gnas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-7: rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgrar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-10: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang sangs rgyas yongs su bstan to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-14: 'jig rten mgon pos brjod pa mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-15: nam mkha' mdud pa bor na ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-16: nam mkha' nyid kyis bkrol bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-17: chags pa mi mnga' chos ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-18: sangs rgyas thabs la mkhas pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-19: 'dir gsang ci yang ma mchis la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-20: 'on kyang gsung ba brjod pa mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-21: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-22: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:415b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ldem po dag ma 'tshal ba'i 'jig rten gnas pa dge 'dir rmongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis @416a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-2: dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yongs su bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-3: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-4: de bzhin du brgyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-10: rang sangs rgyas yongs su bstan par 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-11: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-14: gang dag sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par byas pa de dag 'di la rmongs par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-16: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po dag 'di shes par bya'o snyam du go cha de lta bur bgos pa de dag gnas 'di la rmongs bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-17: gang dag brtson 'grus mi dmigs par brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag 'di la rmongs par mi 'gyur ro; ;gang dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes pa dang ldan par gyur pa de dag 'di la rmongs par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-19: 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-20: ldem dag shin tu shes dka' ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-21: byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416a-22: de yi ched du go cha bgos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-0: le lo @416b can dang blo chung bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-1: dgongs pa kun tu shes mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-2: ldem po dag gi ched du ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-3: de phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-4: 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-5: dgongs pa gang tshe shes gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-6: de tshe de yi shes pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-7: ldem dag rnam par sbyor bar 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-8: de ltar de rtogs byang chub ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-9: byang chub sems dpas thob pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-10: brjod pas byang chub stong pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-11: byang chub kyis kyang brjod pa stong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-12: stong pa stong pa mi shes la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-13: stong pa stong pa zhes kyang brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-14: brjod pa thams cad chad pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-15: stong pa nyid ces rab tu bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-16: nam mkha' rtag tu gzung med de; ;de la gzung ba yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-17: gang la gzung ba yod min pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-18: de ni stong nyid shes par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-19: gang dag bag yod gnas 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-20: de ltar stong nyid shes 'gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-21: mkhas pa de dag gnas 'dir ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-22: kun tu rmongs par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-23: de nas 'khor de'i dge slong dad pas rjes su 'brang bar 'du shes pa bye ba phrag lnga stan las langs te 'dus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-25: 'jig rten mgon po bla na med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-26: sangs rgyas bdag cag dogs ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-27: dgongs te bstan pa gang lags pa; ;byang chub mchog la gnas par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:416b-28: de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-0: de dag ma yin pa gzhan dge slong chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'du shes @417a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-1: pa bye ba phrag lnga stan las langs te 'dus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-3: khyod kyis chos rjes 'brang ba zhes dgongs te yongs su gang bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-4: the tshom de ni ma mchis te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-5: bdag cag byang chub snang ba thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-6: de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-7: de dag ma yin pa gzhan dge slong brgyad par 'du shes pa bye ba phrag bcu stan las langs te 'dus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-9: brgyad pa'i 'du shes gang gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-10: bdag cag 'du shes de rnams bshig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-11: gang gis brgyad par brjod pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-12: dgongs pa de ni bdag cag rtogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-13: de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-14: dge slong gzhan rgyun du zhugs par 'du shes pa bye ba phrag bcu gcig stan las langs te 'dus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-16: sangs rgyas chos la rnam kun tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-17: snang ba bdag cag de ring thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-18: gang phyir rgyun du zhugs bsten pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-19: dgongs pa de ni bdag cag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-20: de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417a-21: dge slong gzhan lan gcig phyir 'ong bar 'du shes pa brgya stong dag stan las langs te 'dus nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-0: bcom ldan 'das @417b kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-1: bdag cag lan gcig phyir 'ong bar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-2: bdag cag mngon par zhen gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-3: de ring zhen pa ma mchis gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-4: dam pa bdag cag spros ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-5: de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-6: dge slong phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa lnga stan las langs te 'dus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-8: mi yi dam pa 'jig rten mgon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-9: bdag cag spros pa ma mchis gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-10: 'obs las brgal nas de ring ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-11: byang chub la yang snang ba thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-12: de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thob nas dge slong bsam gtan bzhi pa la bsam gtan pa bye ba phrag lnga bcu stan las langs te 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-13: de ring ci yang ma mchis gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-14: chos nyid ma lus par yang rtogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-15: sgyu ma'i chos nyid mnyam par ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-16: theg pa thams cad mnyam par 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-17: de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-18: dge slong theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa nyi khri stan las langs te 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar la khong de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:417b-19: lus can rnams la dgrol slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-2: dgongs pa de ni bdag cag rtogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-3: de ni bden pa'am rdzun ma lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-4: de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-5: dge slong rang sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa lnga stong stan las langs te 'dus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-7: rang sangs rgyas nyid bsam yas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-8: rgyal bas dgongs te gang gsungs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-9: rang rgyal byang chub bdag cog la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-10: de ring mngon sum nyid du gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-11: de nas dge slong de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-12: dge slong ma rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-13: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-14: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-15: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bur 'du shes pa 'bum phrag bcu stan las langs te 'dus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-17: bud med dngos por 'gyur pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-18: mnyam pa'i chos rnams yang dag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-19: gzhan mi gsung ba'i sangs rgyas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-21: de nas dge slong ma de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418a-22: dge bsnyen rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-0: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes @418b pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-1: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad stan las langs te 'dug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-3: bdag cag sems dang dri ma med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-4: bee d'urya ltar rnam par dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-5: sangs rgyas chos thob bgyi slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-6: de ring rab tu 'byung bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-7: de nas bar snang la 'khod pa'i lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cus bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog gis gtor nas 'dus te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-8: theg par 'du shes sngon gang gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-10: 'du shes de dang bdag cag bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-11: sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag gtad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-12: de nas sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-17: ka pi na la sogs pa dgra bcom pa stong phrag mang po stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-18: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-19: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-21: deng bdag cag brang pa yongs su rdzogs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-22: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-23: bdud phyir rgol ba bcom lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:418b-24: mtshams med pa lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-0: deng bdag cag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan @419a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-3: deng bdag cag log par lta ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-5: deng bdag cag yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bral lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-7: deng bdag cag gis srog chags brgya stong mang po'i srog bkum lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-9: deng bdag cag gis byang chub thob lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-10: deng bdag cag phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas btang snyoms su mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-12: de nas 'khor de'i srog chags brgya stong mang po dag the tshom du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-14: bdag cag mun par gyur pa 'di ji lta bu zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-15: dgra bcom pa dag kyang tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-16: so so'i skye bo lta smos kyang ci dgos pa zhes 'dzer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-17: the tshom du gyur pa de dag stan las bskyod par mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-18: gang dag 'dug pa de dag ni ldang mi nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419a-19: gang dag langs pa de dag ni 'dug mi nus nas de dag the tshom du gyur te rab tu sems shing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-0: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos srog chags brgya stong mang po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad @419b ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-2: gnas brtan de dag gis smras pa de thos nas srog chags brgya stong mang po 'di dag the tshom du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-3: 'di dag gis gang la bsams te smras pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'di'ang cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-5: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gsungs shig de skad ces smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-8: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyis yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-9: gnas brtan 'di dag gis gang la bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-10: tshig smras pa 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa rnams la mngon sum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-13: gnas brtan 'di dag kyang byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-19: gnas brtan 'di dag gis gang la bsams te tshig smras pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-20: bcom ldan 'das 'di'ang cang mi gsung bar bzhugs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-24: ma ni 'khor ba'i skyed pa'i ma rig pa la bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-25: 'di dag gis ma rig pa de shin tu bcom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:419b-27: pha ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa la bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-0: 'di dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de dang bral @420a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-1: lo; ;dga' bo'i 'dod chags kyang shin tu bcom btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-2: dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-3: 'di dag gis de dag rnam par mi gzhig pa'i tshul gyis rnam par bshig ste bcom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-4: 'di dag la so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes gang yod pa de'ang 'di dag gis chos thams cad mi dbye ba'i tshul gyis phye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-5: 'di dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa gang yod pa'i 'du shes de'ang mi skye ba'i tshul gyis 'di dag dang bral lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-7: 'di dag gis ni 'di la bsams nas deng bdag cag mtshams med pa lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa lags so zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-11: de'i phyir mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-12: 'di dag gis ci la bsams te deng bdag cag gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa lags so zhes de skad smras she na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-14: 'di dag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di dag rmi lam lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-16: mig yor lta bur shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-17: 'di dag la shes pa de yongs su rdzogs shing 'di dag gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ma tshang ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420a-18: yongs su rdzogs pa med par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-0: 'di ltar de dag @420b ni shin tu med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-1: de ltar 'di dag gis de dag yongs su shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-2: de ltar de dag dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-3: de ltar de dag gis shes pa yongs su rdzogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-4: de'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-6: 'di dag gis ni 'di la bsams nas deng bdag cag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa lags so zhes smras so; ;btsun pa kun dga' bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-7: 'di dag gis deng bdag cag log par lta ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-8: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bral lags so zhes de skad gang smras pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-10: 'di dag gis chos thams cad ni log pa yin par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-12: log pa zhes bya ba ni rdzun pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-13: chos thams cad ni rdzun pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-14: gang du'ang sbyor ba med cing nam mkha' dang 'dra ste zhum pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-18: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-19: 'di dag gis de dag de ltar shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-20: yang dag par na chos thams cad mnyam pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-21: mnyam pa de ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-22: 'di dag ni mnyam pa'i 'du shes de dang bral lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-24: byang chub ni 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:420b-25: 'di dag gis chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs par sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag rjes su thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-1: 'di dag gis ni 'di la bsams te deng bdag cag log par lta ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-2: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bral lags so zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-4: 'di dag gis gang la bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-5: deng bdag cag gis srog chags brgya stong mang po'i srog bkum lags so zhes tshig smras pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-7: 'di dag gi ldem po dag 'di thes nas srog chags brgya stong mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-8: lha brgya stong mang pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-10: brag cha lta bur shes shing rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-11: des 'di dag sems can gyi 'du shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-12: srog gi 'du shes dang bral nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-13: chos thams cad bskrun pa med pa'i tshul du dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu bskrun to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-14: 'di thos nas de dag ma yin pa gzhan dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-17: dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang sems can gyi 'du shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-18: srog gi 'du shes dang bral bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-19: de'i phyir de dag yang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421a-22: srog gi 'du shes yod na 'chi bar 'gyur na de dag shin tu mi skye ba'i chos nyid kyis 'du shes de dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-0: 'di dag gis ni @421b 'di la bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-1: deng bdag cag gis srog chags brgya stong mang po'i srog bkum lags so zhes tshig de skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-3: 'di dag gis gang la bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-4: deng bdag cag gis byang chub thob lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-5: deng bdag cag phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings sa yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags so zhes tshig de skad smras pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-7: 'khor 'di'i nang nas srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-8: srog chags brgya stong phrag mang pos deng nyon mongs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang mtshungs par rig nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-9: de'i phyir de dag deng byang chub kyi phyir nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam par rgyal nas 'di skad du deng bdag cag gis byang chub thob lags so zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-10: nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bstan pa'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-12: 'di dag la nyon mongs pa'i chos chung rab tsam yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-14: 'di dag gis ni 'di la bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-15: deng bdag cag gis byang chub thob lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:421b-16: deng bdag cag phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags so zhes tshig de skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-0: deng zhes bya ba ni nyi ma @422a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-1: 'di gang yin pa la deng zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-5: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa des chos thams cad snang ba byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-6: des sems can gang ma thob pa byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni chos thams cad dang 'char ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-7: gang gi tshe [?] de byang chub kyi 'du shes dang bral ba de'i tshe de phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su chos thams cad dang nub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa la ni 'phags pa'i 'du shes kyis 'di nyin mo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-10: byis pa rnams la ni nyi ma'i 'du shes kyis nyin mo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-12: gal te yang dag par snying por nyin mor gyur na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-13: de'i phyir nyin mo rnams phung por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-14: gal te yang dag par snying por phung po 'gyur na ni de'i phyir mtshan mo rnams kyang phung por 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-15: 'das pa'i nyin mtshan rnams 'dres par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-18: btsun pa kun dga' bo; byis pa rnams kyi nyin mo'i 'du shes kyis nyin mo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422a-19: mtshan mo'i 'du shes kyis mtshan mo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis @422b yongs su zin pa la nyin mo la nyin mo'i 'du shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-1: mtshan mo la mtshan mo'i 'du shes med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-3: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-4: de'i phyir mngon sum du smon pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-5: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-7: ma rig pa la ma zhes brjod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-8: de dag de ni rtsar bcas bton //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-9: de phyir ma bsad ces brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-10: tshul bzhin ma yin yid la byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-11: dga' ba'i 'dod chags pa zhes brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-12: de dag yang dag ji bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-13: de ni rtag tu dngos med shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-14: 'di ni yang dag dngos med par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-15: rtsa nas bton la mi skyed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-16: dmigs pa med cing gnas med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-17: des na bsad pa zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-18: dgra bcom chos su gang brjod dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-19: byis pa'i chos gang tha dad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-20: sred pa rnam par bshig pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-21: de phyir dgra bcom bsad ces brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-23: de dag de yi rang bzhin shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-24: chos rnams thams cad dbye med par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-25: dbye ba'i sgrar ni nges par bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-26: rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes 'du shes gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-27: sngon chad rnam par rtag gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-28: skye ba med dang 'gag med par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-29: de dag de ni rtsar bcas bton //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-31: stong zhing dbus dang mtha' stong par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:422b-32: 'di dag gis ni tshig tu brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-2: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga brjod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-3: ming gang gis ni yongs brjod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-4: 'du shes sgyu mar rtogs pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-5: de phyir de dag 'du shes bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-7: sngon chad ji bzhin mi nyung byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-8: 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-9: de dag des ni tshig tu brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-11: 'di dag gis ni stong du shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-12: de la shin tu skye med par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-13: de dag shes pa rab tu rdzogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-14: gso ba stong snying po med par ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-15: log par chos rnams yongs su shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-16: log ces bya ba'ang brdzun du brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-18: chos rnams thams cad rdzun pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-19: gang du'ang yang dag 'dre ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-20: nam mkha' sor mo lnga lta bur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-21: med pas yang dag 'dre ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-22: yang dag ces ni gang brjod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-23: lta ba de dag rnams kyis [?] shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-24: chos kyi mnyam nyid gang dang mnyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-25: lta ba shes pa'ang de dang mnyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-27: byis pa'i blo can rnams kyis brtags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-28: sems can rnams ni mi dmigs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-30: gang gis skye bo rab mang dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-31: sdug bsngal blangs pa mi 'dor ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-32: srog tu 'du shes rab sdig can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423a-34: de dag sems can 'du shes bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-0: srog tu 'du shes rnam par @423b bshig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-1: des na sems can mang po yid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-2: srog bcad ces ni brjod pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-3: de dag nyon mongs kun las rgyal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-4: nyon mongs med pa'i chos nyid rtogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-5: byang chub sgro btags med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-6: 'gyur med rab tu dri med shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-7: bdud rnams mtha' dag pham par byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-8: sangs rgyas chos rnams rnam par sbyangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-9: chos kun mi mthun med pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-10: skye ba med pas mya ngan 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-11: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras ma thag tu de nas srog chags brgya stong rab tu mang po de dag the tshom dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-13: chos thams cad la snang ba'ang thob par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-14: de dag thams cad kyis so so nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dga' ba phul te tshig 'di skad du ji ltar da ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang chos brjod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-15: sems can la'ang bstan par bgyi'o zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-18: ldem po ngag tu smras pa de dag legs par bshad pa ni legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-22: srog chags brgya stong mang po the tshom dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:423b-23: som nyi za bar gyur pa gang dag the tshom dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-1: rnam par bkrol ba'i srog chags brgya stong mang po de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas yongs su smin par byas pa dag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-4: de dag ni 'dis chos bstan pa kun tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-8: 'di dag byang chub las slar mi ldog pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-12: 'di dag ni byang chub la phyir mi ldog pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-14: 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-18: dge slong gang dag dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i 'du shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-19: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'du shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-20: de bzhin du brgyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-26: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes rnams las langs pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub las slar mi ldog pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-29: 'di ni yid ches par dka' ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424a-30: dman pa la mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-1: dran pa brjed nges pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-3: mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-5: mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis yongs su zin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-6: lus rjes su srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-7: srog rjes su srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-9: srog la lta ba dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-11: ngang tshul ngan pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-15: sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-16: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-18: dmigs par lta ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-20: bkur sti lhur len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-22: chos gos la chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-24: nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor du bya ba la mi brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-27: ngag rtsub po'i tshig can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-28: tshig kyal pa smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-32: 'brel pa gang yang rung bas 'brel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-33: pho nya'i las kyi spyod yul pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-34: mtshan ma la spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:424b-38: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-1: pa'i chos thams cad la ma dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-3: chos de lta bu dang ldan pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-7: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-9: ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas 'da' bar mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-12: phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i sems can phal cher 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-13: de dag mi mos pas de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas 'da' bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-16: gang dag 'dir mos par 'gyur ba gang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-19: gang dag mos par 'gyur ba ni nyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-23: sems can gang dag don la mkhas pa de dag ni nyung zad cig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-24: gang dag mi mkhas pa ni rab tu mang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-26: de dag de la mi spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-27: de'i phyir de la mi mkhas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425a-29: de bzhin du gang dag chos bstan pa 'di la mos pa'i sems can ni nyung zad cig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-0: gang dag mos par 'gyur ba de dag @425b ni rtag tu bkur sti bya bar mi 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-5: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor nas yongs su spang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-7: 'di ltar de dag ni rang gi las kyi sgrib pa chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las sngon byas pas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-10: gang dag mos pa nyung bar 'gyur ba de dag nyid kyi ched du gsungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-13: bcom ldan 'das la zhus zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-14: bcom ldan 'das khyod la lan 'debs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-17: gang dag mos pa nyung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-18: rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid kyi ched du bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-19: de dag gis thos nas kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-21: ljags kyis dbang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par bkab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-22: ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od phyung nas 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:425b-24: snang ba chen pos snang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-0: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs @426a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-1: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston par mthong zhing de dag gis chos bstan pa de'ang thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-3: phyogs bcu kun tu chos bstan pa 'di nyid lhag chad med par thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-5: bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-6: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis par mang ba 'di dag kyang chos bstan pa 'di nyid lhag chad ma mchis par ston par mthong lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa 'di nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-8: chos kyi bka' mchid 'di nyid rgyun mi gcad par bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ljags kyi dbang po de bsdus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-10: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-12: lce'i dbang po 'di lta bu rdzun smra ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-16: de'i slad du gang dag mos pa nyung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-17: rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid kyi ched du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-18: gang dag ma mos pa de dag kyang dbang du gyur pa de dag gis mos par bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-0: 'khor bzhi po gang @426b da ltar 'dus pa de thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-4: dri za gang dag chos bstan pa 'di thos pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-5: de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-6: ji ltar da ltar nga ston pa bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lhag chad med par sa phyogs 'di nyid du ston par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-7: de nas 'khor bzhi po de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-11: dri za rnams tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-12: rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-14: kha cig gis ni gos rnams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-15: kha cig gis ni me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-17: byug pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor to; ;bud med rnams kyis ni rgyan thams cad lus las phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-18: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-19: gtor nas kyang thams cad 'dus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni gnyis su ma mchis pa gsung ba lags so zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:426b-23: kun dga' bo bud med 'di dag gis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par @427a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-1: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni gnyis su med pa gsung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-5: dri ma mi mnga' ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-6: des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thos pa don yod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thos zhes bgyi ba 'di ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-18: de'i phyir nyon cig dang ngas bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-23: gang dag gis sh'akya thub pa zhes nga'i ming thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-26: byang chub ni chags pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-28: gti mug med pa ste don yod pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-29: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la me tog gcig 'bul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427a-30: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rnams la me tog gcig 'thor ba dag lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427b-0: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur ba'i @427b sems can gang dag gis thos pa de dag kyang byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427b-3: gang la la dag sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba thos pa de nyid de dag gi byang chub kyi sa bon du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427b-5: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thos pa don yod pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427b-6: de ltar gyur na ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su med pa gsung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427b-8: khyod 'di la ji snyam du sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427b-9: shing n+ya gro dha gang gi grib ma la srog chags brgya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427b-13: lnga brgya 'khod pa'i shing n+ya gro dha'i sa bon ji tsam zhig yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427b-16: de'i sa bon chung lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427b-19: sa bon de tsam du chung ba de las shing n+ya gro dha de skyes nas rim gyis 'phel zhing bdo ste rgyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427b-26: shing n+ya gro dha de sa bon chung ngu las skyes nas rim gyis 'phel zhing bdo ste rgyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:427b-27: yangs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-0: sh'akya thub pa'i sgra thos pa'i sa bon de'ang rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @428a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-3: rab tu chud za bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-7: chos thams cad kyi sa bon 'di ni gnas pa med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-8: de'i phyir rab tu chud za bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-10: chos thams cad kyi sa bon 'di ni chud mi za ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-11: de'i phyir chud mi za bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-13: chos thams cad kyi sa bon 'di ni mngon par zhen pa med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-14: des na rul bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-15: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-16: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-19: 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi smon lam lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-20: 'on te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thos pa don mchis pa 'di chos nyid lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-23: ngas gang nga'i ming thos pa de bla na med pa yang dag pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig ces smon lam 'di'ang btab par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-24: yang 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid kyang yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428a-27: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis mtshungs mnyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-0: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos nyid kyis @428b mtshungs mnyam pa de'i tshe ci'i slad du smon lam mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-2: byang chub sems dpa' chos dam pa 'di ma thos pa rnams smon lam 'debs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-3: smon lam des myung du chos bstan pa 'di thos pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-6: gang dag rnam pa de lta bu'i chos rnams dang ldan zhing sems can mang po'i don mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-7: ci tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-12: sangs rgyas kyi don du ngas sems can mang po'i don byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-14: nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-16: ngas sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-19: srog la ma bltas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-20: bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-21: ser sna dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-22: brtson 'grus chen po brtsams nas chos thams cad la mi gnas par sems can thams cad la phan btags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-23: chos thams cad mi gsung ba'i phyir byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-24: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:428b-25: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:429a-1: bdud sdig can bar chad mi bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:429a-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sngar byin gyis brlabs pas de'i phyir bar chad mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:429a-7: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyis brlabs de bsdus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:429a-8: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can gyi phyir byin gyi rlabs bsdus ma thag tu de nas rmi lam tsam gyi tshod du bdud sdig can gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i sgra thos shing sh'akya thub pa'i mtshan kyang thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:429a-9: de nas bdud sdig can 'jigs skrag dngangs te spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas bdag gi rnam par rgyal ba thams cad ni rnam par rgyal ba ma yin par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:429a-10: bdag gi yul thams cad ni yul ma yin par 'gyur zhes tshig tu smra zhing de mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:429a-11: de mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don pas rgas 'khogs pa'i gzugs su gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:429a-16: de nas bdud sdig can yan lag bzhi ba'i dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud kyi ris kyi lha ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:429b-8: son nas kyang de'i dpung yan lag bzhi pa de la bar snang la 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i sgra dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:429b-12: de nas bdud sdig can gcig pu gnyis su med par bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-22: de ni bskyod par mi nus so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-24: dgon pa chen por zhugs pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-25: gcig tu mya ngan 'da' bya bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-26: 'di las bskyod pa'i nus pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-27: gal te 'gar ni des dmigs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-28: de ltar de dag bskyod par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-29: sems can med phyir de dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-30: bskyod par mi bya zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-31: byang chub ma yin brjod pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-32: nam yang su la'ang byin pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-33: de phyir 'dir ni gang brtson pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-34: de ni bskyod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-35: lus can rnams kyis ma byin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434a-36: sbyin pa chos sbyin bsam mi khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-0: de yi phyir @434b na gang brtson pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-1: de ni bskyod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-2: 'dod la log par g-yem brjod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-3: 'di la log par yod min par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-4: de ltar shes nas gang brtson pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-5: de ni bskyod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-6: brten nas rdzun gyi tshig smra bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-7: gnas pa'i skye bo rnam grol bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-8: gtso bo brtson 'grus rtsom byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-9: de ni bskyod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-10: phra ma'i tshig rtsub gang yin dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-11: kyal par smra ba gang yin pa; ;de dag thams cad sgyu ma 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-12: gsog ste rtag tu dngos po med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-13: de yi gnas sam gnas pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-14: nam yang yod pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-15: sgra ni brag ca mtshungs rig bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-16: de'ang gnas pa yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-17: de yi chags sems gang byung ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-18: bdag la chags pa'i khyad par can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-19: bdag de de yis yongs shes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-20: des na de ni bskyod mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-21: gang gis gnod sems rang bzhin gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-22: mtshan nyid med la byang chub de'ang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-23: de yi mtshan nyid yin shes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-24: de ni bskyod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-25: log par lta ba yongs shes pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-26: yang dag lta bas rab phye la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-27: grangs kun las ni rnam 'das gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-28: de ni bskyod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-29: shes rab can dag gzhon nu ma //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-30: sbyin du 'jug par mi byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-31: gzhon nu sbyin pa rab sdig pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-32: 'di ni snang ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-33: log par lta bas tshul khrims gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:434b-36: 'dzud par byed pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-2: bzod pa rnam mang gang yod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-3: de ni lam rjes 'gro bzod dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-5: gzhan gyur mu stegs gdung ba lnga //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-6: de las sogs la brtson bzod gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-7: de ni byang chub thob byed min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-8: de phyir mkhas pa der mi brtson //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-9: 'di la phyi rol mtshan ma can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-10: de dag ting 'dzin spyod yul kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-11: sangs rgyas rnams kyis smad pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-12: de la de ni 'dzud mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-13: 'dod ldan shes rab gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-14: de la 'dzud par mi byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-15: shes pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-16: ye shes bsam yas 'grub byed min /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-17: byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-18: gang zhig sems can sdud byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-19: blo ldan de ni sems can rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-20: sdud pa de las bskyod mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-21: sems can 'du shes zhen pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-22: 'dir ni byang chub sems brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-23: byang chub de ni zhen pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-24: de ni bskyod par nus ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-25: pha dang ma dang spun rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-26: sring mo bu dang rtsa lag rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-27: thams cad sgyu ma lta bur brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-28: de dag bskyod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-29: dngos po sna tshogs de dag rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-30: kun la 'du shes de dngos med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-31: chos gang dngos po yod min pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-32: de ni bskyod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-33: nyin mtshan 'du shes gang yin dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-34: zla gcig zla phyed gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-35: 'du shes de kun chags med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435a-36: dper na smig rgyu'i chu bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-0: sbyin dang tshul khrims @435b bzod brtson 'grus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-1: bsam gtan shes rab byang chub sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-2: stobs dang mi 'jigs rnams la yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-3: 'du shes gyur ba gang yin dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-4: dbang po byang chub yan lag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-5: lam rnams la'ang gang skyes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-6: de ni mi shes byung shes nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-7: mkhas pa g-yo bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-10: sna tshogs bral la rab gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-11: de las bskyod par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-13: gang dag kun mkhyen 'du shes med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-14: de dag sangs rgyas byang chub ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-15: bsam yas byang chub rgyang ring byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-16: byang chub ring bar mi 'gyur zhes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-17: de phyir sdig can mdun du 'dir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-18: de dag 'di las mi bskyod ces //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-19: ngas ni tshig tu brjod pa byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-20: chos rnams kun dang sems can rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-21: de kun ji bzhin de bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-22: rnam par bkrol nas sdig pa can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-23: blo gros ngan pas de ma rtogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud slar btang ba bstan pa 'di bshad ma thag tu de nas srog chags bye ba phrag bcu po de dag the tshom dang bral zhing som nyi spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-25: chos thams cad la snang ba thob par gyur nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-26: bzod pa thob ma thag tu thams cad 'dus te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:435b-27: sangs rgyas lam ni bsam yas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-0: lam gyi dam pa mngon par @436a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-2: som nyi gcod pa rnam 'dren pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-3: bcom ldan bdag cag ston pa lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-4: bdag cag kun tu snang ba thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-5: sangs rgyas lam la legs par gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-6: phyogs rnams thams cad snang gyur cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-7: sangs rgyas bye ba rnams kyang mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-8: rtag tu gzugs la mi gnas pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-9: chos nyid kyang ni mthong 'gyur ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-10: de ltar bdag cag rnams kyi mig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-12: de nas srog chags bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-13: thams cad kyis so so nas gos rnams bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-14: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir gtor nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-16: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du grags par gyur cig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-19: gang dag bdud slar btang ba bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-20: yid ches te the tshom mi skyed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-22: de dag bsod nams ci tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436a-26: rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig snga dro'i dus na sangs rgyas brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-0: nyi ma gung gi dus na sangs rgyas @436b brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-1: phyem red kyi dus na sangs rgyas brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-2: nam gyi cha stod la sangs rgyas brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-3: nam gyi gung la sangs rgyas brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-4: nam gyi cha smad la sangs rgyas brgya la bsti stang du byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-6: rim gror byed la mchod par byed cing bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-7: bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-8: tshul 'dis lo nyi khrir bsnyen bkur byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-12: rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-15: mang lags so; ;bde bar gshegs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-18: dpe bgyi bar sla ba ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-22: rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig bdud slar btang ba bstan pa 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing yid ches te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-23: the tshom skyed par mi 'gyur ba de bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-24: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gsum me tog man d'a ra ba ri bo ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa bye ba brgya stong du ma thogs nas nam mkha' bar snang las 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-25: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:436b-26: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag rgyang ring po nas 'ong bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437a-1: ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437a-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gang nas mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na; 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ltar padma mngon 'phags zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437a-8: der 'di dag gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas de'i phyir de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de nas lhags so; ;de nas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gsum po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437a-9: me tog man dang ba de dag bcom ldan 'das la gtor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437a-15: bdag cag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing yid ches te the tshom ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437a-16: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ltar bdag cag la'ang som nyi ci'ang ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437a-20: de nas de dag gi nang nas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-0: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa zhes @437b yang dag pa'i smra bas smra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bdag lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-2: bdag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la som nyi ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-4: byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gnyis pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-6: gang dag bcom ldan 'das zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas smra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-7: bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag lags te; bdag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la som nyi ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gsum pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-10: gang dag sangs rgyas zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas smra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-12: sangs rgyas de ni bdag lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-13: bdag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la som nyi ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-15: de nas 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags brgya stong mang po dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-16: ji ltar yang sangs rgyas gnyis 'jig rten du gcig car 'byung mi srid na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-17: ci'i phyir 'di dag 'di skad smra snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-18: de dag yeng yeng por gyur nas rang rang gi stan la mi dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-19: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-20: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:437b-23: 'di dag 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa ltar ming de dag lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438a-3: 'di la gcig gi ming ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra brjod pas yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438a-4: gnyis pa'i ming ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra brjod pas yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438a-5: gsum pa'i ming ni sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pas yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438a-10: smra ba'i rnam grangs 'di yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438a-11: yang 'di dag gi ming ni de dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438a-14: gang dag yeng yeng por gyur pa de dag gis 'di la bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438a-15: 'di dag gis 'di skad smras so zhes 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438a-16: de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams de bas kyang ches 'od gsal bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438a-19: khye'u gzhon nu thor bu sha mdog yongs su dag pa des tsandan dmar po'i chus kyang bkrus na de'i lus de bas kyang dri dang ldan zhing sha mdog yongs su dag la 'od gsal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438a-21: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ldem po ngag la mkhas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de bas kyang ches 'od gsal bar 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag gi ldem po ngag tu smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438b-0: srog chags brgya stong mang po yeng yeng por gyur pa rnams la bshad @438b du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438b-2: 'das dang da ltar byung ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438b-3: ma 'ongs de bzhin nyid lta bur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438b-4: chos kun de ltar mthong de'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438b-5: de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438b-6: da ltar byung dang 'das pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:438b-7: ma 'ongs chos rnams gang yin pa //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446a-18: gang dag chos 'di spong bgyid pa //
