K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446a-20: dri nga ba yi ro bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446a-21: kun nas yongs su spang bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446a-22: dper na chom rkun gong 'joms dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446a-23: dgon pa dag la gnas 'chas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446a-24: thos nas blo gros ngan pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446a-26: de ltar gang dag mdo sde 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446a-27: spong bar bgyid pa gti mug rmongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446a-28: shin tu sdig can blo ngan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-3: rigs kyi bu 'di dag ji tsam du blo shin tu rnam par des pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-6: 'di dag ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pas tshig 'di skad mchi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-7: 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di skad ces mchi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-10: 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus de skad du smra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-11: rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa'ang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-12: chags pa med pa thob pa'ang yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-15: rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis ji ltar da ltar nga las thos pa bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'di tsam du lhag chad med par thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-16: 'di dag gis de rjes su dran nas ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-17: sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di skad ces smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-20: 'di dag gis ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-21: 'di dag la de mngon sum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-22: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:446b-23: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-0: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag @447a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-1: tu mos shing the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-4: rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-8: rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis dzambu'i gling 'di rin po ches yongs su bkang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-10: gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing dad de yid ches la the tshom mi za ba de de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-12: dzambu'i gling rin po ches bkang ba lta zhog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-14: gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po ches bkang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar phul ba bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-16: gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-17: thos nas kyang thos ma thag tu mos shing dad de yid ches la the tshom mi za ba de de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-0: rin @447b chen bkang ste de bzhin gshegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-1: skyob pa sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-2: rnams la dbul ba byas pa bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-3: mkhas pa gang gis mdo sde 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-4: thos nas lhag par mos byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-5: mos dang ldan de bsod nams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-6: de bas mang du bskyed par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-7: gang gis gangg'a'i bye snyed kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-8: zhing dag rin chen rnams bka' ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-9: sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-11: bam po drug pa ste tha ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-12: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-13: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-16: rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mas nas rtogs te 'dzin tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-23: rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:447b-27: rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bral bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bskal pa brgyar sbyin pa byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-0: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bral bar bskal pa brgyar tshul khrims @448a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bral bar bskal pa brgyar bzod pa sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-3: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bral bar bskal pa brgyar brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-4: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bral bar bskal pa brgyar bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-5: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bral bar bskal pa brgyar shes rab sgom zhing 'jig rten gyi gnas rnams la mkhas par gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-7: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti byas par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-9: gang gis bskal pa brgya tshang bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-10: bza' ba la sogs thams cad kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-12: des ni bsti stang byas mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-15: de ni sangs rgyas bkur sti byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-16: chos kyi bkur sti byas pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-17: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-18: chos skyes chos kyi tog ldan pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-19: sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-20: des na sangs rgyas bkur sti byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-21: gang gis bskal pa brgya tshang bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-22: gos la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-23: sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448a-24: de dag des ni bkur byas min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-0: @448b de ltas sangs rgyas bkur bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-1: 'di ni bkur sti rnams kyi mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-2: gos mang byin pa de ltar min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-3: gang gis bskal pa brgya tshang bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-4: 'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-5: spos dang me tog gtor byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-6: de dag des ni bkur byas min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-7: gang zhig tshul mchog zab mo yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-10: bkur sti byed pa dam pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-11: gang gis 'jig rten mgon po yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-12: mchod rten rin chen rgyu las bsgrubs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-13: ri rab 'dra ba byas kyang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-14: des ni sangs rgyas bkur byas min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-16: 'dzin par yang ni mi lta na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-17: de ni bsnyen bkur mchog yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-18: mchod pa kun gyi nang na mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-19: gang zag gang zhig bskal pa brgya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-20: tshang bar tshul khrims srung byed la; ;mdo sde 'di ni mi 'dzin na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-21: tshul khrims de ni mchog ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-23: 'dzin par rlom sems med na ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-24: tshul khrims de ni bsngags pa ste; ;tshul khrims de ni bla na med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-25: tshul 'di kun tu gzung ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-26: mkhas pa tshul khrims chen po dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-27: bsam gyis mi khyab dpag med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-28: tshul khrims gang yin de de tshol; ;nga yis ji skad bshad pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-29: mdo 'di la ni gang slob pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-30: mnyam mthong de la tshul khrims dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-31: ngang tshul ngan pa yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:448b-32: gang zhig mdo 'dir mi slob pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-1: ni byang chub phyir mi slob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-2: byang chub de dang bslab pa mnyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-3: de ni sus kyang bslabs pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-5: de ni mdo 'dir bshad pa yi; ;tshul khrims de 'dra de dag gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-6: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-7: bzod dang ldan pa'i mi gang zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-8: 'dir ni bskal pa brgyar tshang bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-9: sems can dag ni thams cad kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-10: mi snyan brjod dang spyos bzod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-11: rkang lag dag kyang gtub pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-12: de yi sems ni 'gyur med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-13: de ni gang du'ang tha ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-14: rab tu zhe sdang mi skyed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-15: bzod pa smra ba'i mi gang zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-16: bzod pa rnam pa de lta bus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-17: bskal pa bye ba zad byed kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-18: bzod pa de ni bsngags ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-19: gang zhig mdo 'di thos nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-21: de ni bzod pa rnams kyi mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-22: de ni bzod pa shin tu bzang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-24: gang du'ang chags par mi byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-25: bzod pa de ni khyad par 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-26: bzod pa de ni bla na med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-27: gang zhig sangs rgyas ye shes mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-28: chags med ye shes 'dod pa des //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-29: mdo sde 'di la mi chags par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-30: myur du 'di ni gzung bar bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-31: gang zhig bskal pa brgya tshang bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-33: gnyid kyis ma non bdag nyid can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449a-34: rtag tu 'da' bar byed pa bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-0: mkhas pa gang zhig lung @449b ma nod phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-1: mdo sde 'di la sbyor byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-2: brtson 'grus de ni de bas mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-4: gang zhig bskal pa brgya tshang bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-5: drang srong mngon shes lnga ldan gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-6: mdo sde 'di ni mi nyan na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-7: mngon shes mchog ces mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-8: gang zhig don shes mi gnas par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-10: de ni mngon shes thams cad kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-11: mngon par shes pa'i mchog yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-12: mi gang bskal pa brgya tshang bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-13: shes rab dang ni ldan gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-14: 'jig rten pa yi shes rab ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-15: 'jig rten bya ba rnams la nges //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-16: gang zhig tshul 'di mi slob na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-17: de ni shes rab tshul shes min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-19: dpa' bo de nyid shes rab ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-20: gang zhig mdo sde dam pa 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-21: thos nas mos shing rtogs byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-22: brtan pa de ni shes rab ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-23: de ni shes rab mkhas pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-24: gang zhig chos kun shes rab kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-25: shes par 'dod pa ji ltas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-26: mdo sde 'di ni lung nod la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-28: mdo sde 'dir ni rab bshad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-29: de ni shes rab spyod yul yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-30: de yi phyir na mdo sde 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-31: gzung bar brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-33: dpag tshad rangs pa'am 'on tam ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:449b-34: dpag tshad brgyar yang brgyugs nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-1: bu sna tshogs sel ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-2: mdo sde 'di ni mnyan par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-3: kha tshon dpag tshad rangs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-4: me mdag gang la brgal nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-5: gang na mdo sde 'di gnas par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-6: mkhas pas myur du mchi bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-7: bsam gtan kun gyi dam pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-8: bsam gtan ba gang bsam gtan 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-9: des ni nyon mongs kun sel ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-10: mdo sde 'di ni lung mnod bgyi;/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-12: grags pa mngon dga' zhes bgyi ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-13: shin tu mdzes der mchi 'tshal ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-14: des ni mdo sde 'di bshad bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-15: gang zhig sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-16: thub ba bla med mthong 'tshal ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-17: des ni mdo 'di lung mnod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-18: mang du bklag cing gzung bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-19: gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-20: bde ba can du mchi 'tshal ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-21: des ni mdo 'di lung mnos na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-22: myur ba nyid du mchi bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-23: sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-24: mdo sde 'di ni bton bgyis nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-25: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-26: bsam gyis mi khyab de mthong 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-27: byang chub sems dpa' ma smad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-29: sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-30: mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-31: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-4: ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-7: rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gang gi tshe sems mi g-yeng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-8: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i yid kyis mdo 'di klug gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-9: kha ton byed na de de'i tshe sangs rgyas gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-10: gang mthong bar 'dod pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-12: ji ste sems g-yengs nas mi klug gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-13: kha ton mi byed na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mig lam du mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-16: gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung nod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-20: rigs kyi bu mo de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-21: de nas gzhon nur gyur ma seng ges gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-22: bud med du gyur bas mdo 'di lung mnos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-25: bklags na yon tan ci zhig tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; ;seng ge /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:450b-27: gal te bud med bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung nod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-1: 'chang na de'i bud med kyi dngos po de nyid tha mar gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-3: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung mnos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-7: bklags pas nyon mongs pa gang dag gis bud med bud med kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa'i bud med kyi nyon mongs pa rnams bud med la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-8: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-9: gzhon nur gyur ma seng ges bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-11: nyon mongs pa gang dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa'i bud med kyi nyon mongs pa de dag gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-14: 'di la bud med kyis bud med gzugs bzang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-15: mdzes pa blta na sdug par rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-17: gzhan mthong na de de la 'dod pa bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-18: 'di ni ngan skyugs kyi gong bu la tshon gyis bris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-21: ngan skyugs kyis spags pa yin pa de ltar mi rtog na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-22: de de la de ltar mi rtog cing sdug par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-23: de la 'dod pa bskyed pas bud med bud med kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451a-26: 'di la bud med phrag dog can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-1: g-yo dang ldan par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-2: de gzhan du tshig tu smra zhing gzhan du sems kyis 'phrog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-3: gzhan du tshig tu mngon sum du smra zhing gzhan du gsang bar sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-4: nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir dge slong gi gan du 'gro ba'i chos kyi phyir ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-5: khro bas zil gyis non pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-8: 'du 'ji la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i lung mnod pa don du mi gnyer ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-10: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems kyis nyin mtshan zad par byed kyang rnam par byang ba'i sems kyis ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-11: nyon mongs pa de dag gis bud med de bud med kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin te zad par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-15: bud med kyis bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad mi skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-16: mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung nod par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-22: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bud med kyi nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-23: gzhon nur gyur ma seng ges gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:451b-25: gal te bud med bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur bar mi 'tshal la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lung nod cing 'dzin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-4: bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur bar mi 'dod du zin kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung nod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-6: de nyid bud med kyi dngos po'i tha ma yin par shes par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-7: rdzu 'phrul gyi ston pa ni ma gtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-12: bud med la la zhig me'i phung po chen po kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce dang bcas par bdag nyid kyi lus mchongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-14: bdag gi lus 'tshig par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-15: bdag gi pags pa'i mdog ma gyur cig ces smras na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-19: bud med de tshig de skad smras pas bsam pa de 'thob par 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-24: zhugs kyi phung po chen po ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-25: pags pa'i mdog ma mchis par bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-28: de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-30: de bas na bud med bud med kyi dngos po mi 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-31: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams myur du bsgrub par 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452a-32: sangs rgyas grangs med pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-0: sbobs pa @452b chags pa med pa thob par 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid gzung bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-6: de nas gzhon nur gyur ma seng ge gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-7: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-9: bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las mnos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-10: de slan chad 'di srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'dzin du stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-14: gzhon nur gyur ma seng ges bud med kyi dngos po ma bsgyur lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-17: gzhon nur gyur ma seng ge bud med yin snyam du sems sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-26: 'di ni gzhon nur gyur ma seng ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-27: gzhon nu ma ma lnga brgya po 'di dag gi cho 'phrul yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:452b-28: phyi ma'i skye bo mthong nas bud med la snying brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453a-0: bud med bud med kyi dngos po las rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir gzhon nur gyur ma @453a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453a-3: 'di dag ni skyes pa mi 'jug cing 'jug tu mi dbang ba'i phyi ma thams cad du zhugs nas cho 'phrul gyis bud med 'dul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453a-5: gzhon nur gyur ma seng ge la ni bud med kyi chos med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453a-8: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'dis bud med mi dmigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453a-10: gzhon nur gyur ma seng ges chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtogs par khong du chud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453a-13: de lta bas na gzhon nur gyur ma seng ge'i rjes su slob par 'dod pa'i bud med kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453a-19: de nas dge slong ma lnga stong stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453a-20: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453a-21: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453a-23: bdag cag deng slan chad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453a-29: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453a-31: bdag cag ni bud med kyi dngos po don du gnyer ba ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-0: bcom ldan @453b 'das; bdag cag ni bud med kyi dngos po la smod lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-2: bdag cag deng slan chad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun chub par ma gyur gyi bar du mchis par mi bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-4: gnyid kyis non par mi bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-8: khyed kyis tshig 'di la legs par smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-9: go cha chen po bgos shing khyed ci nas kyang bud med kyi dngos po ni don du mi gnyer la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni don du gnyer ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chen po 'di brtsams pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-12: de bas na khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus de bas kyang rtsoms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-13: de nas dge slong ma de dag gis 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu nas yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-14: so so nas bla gos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bkab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-15: bkab nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-16: skyes pa'i dngos po'i ched du ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-17: de ring bdag cag dbugs rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:453b-18: rgyal ba gzhan du mi gsung bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-0: de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma lnga brgyas dge slong ma de dag gi tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs @454a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-1: su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-4: bdag cag kyang deng slan chad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-10: bdag cag slan chad gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-11: gzhan gyi gdong du lta bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-14: bcur mngal na 'dzin par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-15: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-17: bud med du gyur pa slan chad rgyal po'i khyim du skyes kyang gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-18: ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du khyim thab la bsnyen bkur bgyi 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-20: bdag cag deng slan chad ma gum gyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-21: za gcig tu 'tshal bar yang dag pa blang bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-23: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lus la gnas par bgyis par ma gyur gyi bar du khyim thab kyang sug pa nas 'dzin du ma stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-26: khyed kyis tshig 'di legs par smra ba legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-28: de ni khyed gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454a-29: gzhan gyi ngor blta bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-0: da zla ba dgu'am @454b bcur mngal na 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med med par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-4: sring mo 'di dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ci zhes bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-7: 'di dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ni rin po che'i padma lta bur snang ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig bzhugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-13: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la nor bu rin po che rnam par 'thor bar snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs shing chos kyang ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-14: khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'don bzhin du de mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-15: de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma dge bsnyen ma de dag gis 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-16: rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-18: mu tig gi do shal nor bu rin po ches spras pa khri mgul nas bkrol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:454b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-1: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-2: bud med dngos po bsgyur ba la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-3: de ring bdag cag dbugs rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-4: sangs rgyas gzhan du mi gsung ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-5: bden ba'i gsung du bka' stsal pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-6: nyon mongs shin tu sdig pa'i lus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-7: bud med lus ni spang bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-8: yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-9: byis pa dag ni mkhas la rmongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-10: bdag cag slan chad mngal gyi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-12: dge ba dam pa thob pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-13: bdag cag mngal gyi gnas dang bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-14: de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing phyag 'tsal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-15: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lha'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-17: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-19: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun chub par bgyis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-22: de'i phyir khyod da phyin chad lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455a-23: lha ma yin gyi g-yul ngor 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-0: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas srog chags brgya stong mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa @455b ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-2: gang tshun chad bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma bskor ba de srid du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub tu thugs ma bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-6: khyod de'i phyir phyogs bcur snang bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-7: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-11: de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-12: lha'i me tog rnams kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu pus mo nub tsam du khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-14: bcom ldan 'das; sa chen po g-yos pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-16: me tog 'di dag ni sus gtor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-18: kun dga' bo; lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa thos nas dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog 'di dag gtor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:455b-20: tshig 'di skad du; bdag cag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-0: bdag cag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur @456a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-2: tshig 'di smras ma thag tu de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mngon du gyur nas de dag thams cad tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la phyag btsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-5: de nas sa g-yos pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-6: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-7: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan chen po dang ldan pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-11: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-13: sems can gang dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags par 'gyur ba de dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-18: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan la thos nas kyang mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-21: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-24: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-25: de dag ni ngan song ngan 'gror rnam par lhung ba thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456a-26: mi khoms par skye ba thams cad las grol ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-0: @456b de dag gis bdud sdig can bcom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-1: de dag gis chos kyi tog bsgreng ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-2: de dag gis chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-3: de dag gis mun pa mun nag bsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-4: de dag gis byang chub kyi snying por phyin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-6: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-8: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-13: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-14: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-17: klog pa de dag ni nga'i bu chos kyi sku las skyes pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-18: de dang de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas za bar 'dod pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-19: de dang de dag ni ji ltar da lta na nga 'dug pa bzhin du byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug par 'dod pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-21: de dag ni ji ltar da lta na nga ston pa de bzhin du chos ston par 'dod pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-22: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-23: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-25: slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na kha cig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:456b-27: kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-4: gang dag da lta na mos pa de dag phyi ma'i dus na mos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-5: gang dag da lta na 'dzin pa de dag phyi ma'i dus na 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-6: gang dag da lta na klog pa de dag phyi ma'i dus na klog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-8: gang gis da ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pa de phyi ma'i dus na 'di thos par 'gyur ba de ni ngas lha dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-10: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-12: bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu 'jig rten na ma mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-13: de ni gnas ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-15: 'di da ltar gang dag gi nor yin pa phyi ma'i dus na'ang de dag gi nor du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-20: khyim bdag gi bu 'ga' zhig phyug cing nor che la longs spyod che zhing nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-21: yo byad mang bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-22: des gter dag gter du bcug nas yul gzhan du song na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-24: de la ji snyam du sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-25: de slar 'ongs ma thag tu des gang gter du bcug pa de rnyed par 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-29: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-30: nor de de nyid kyi lags pa'i slad du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-1: de bzhin du 'di da ltar gang dag gi nor yin pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang de dag gi nor du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-2: de dag ji ltar da lta na nga [?] yang dag par bged pa bzhin du chos kyi nor bla na med pa 'di gzhan dag dang yang dag par bged par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-4: gang dag phyi ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-6: kun chub par byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-9: klog par 'gyur ba rnams kyang ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-10: dper na; da ltar bzhin du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-11: gang dag spong bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-12: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-13: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-15: gang dag mos par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-17: mi snyan pa brjod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-18: sun 'byin pa de dag gi 'gro ba ci lta bu zhig tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-21: khyod kyis 'di dris pas ci zhig bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-23: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-26: gang dag mos par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:457b-27: yid ches par mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang mos par 'gyur zhing rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458a-2: mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa de de dag gi 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458a-5: gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyi srog bcad na de'i 'gro ba ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458a-10: de ni de'i 'gro ba yin par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458a-12: gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mchod rten bshi ga ste mes kyang btang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458a-13: ci de gzhi de las bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed par 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458a-19: de gzhi de las bsod nams ma lags pa mang du bskyed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458a-20: de ni mnyam par mi bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458a-23: de ni de'i 'gro ba yin par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458a-27: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi tshul 'gag par byed na de'i 'gro ba ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-0: sdig pa can lags @458b te ;de ni tshig tu brjod par sla ba ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-2: de ni de'i 'gro ba yin par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-5: yang gang zhig sems can gzhan yang zlog par bgyid na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-6: de'i 'gro ba ji lta bu zhig tu 'tshal bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-9: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-10: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi mig phyung na de'i 'gro ba ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-12: bskal ba mang por dmus long du 'gyur zhing sems can dmyal ba pa'i zhugs kyis sreg pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tsher ba'ang myong bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-16: khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-17: gang gis sems can gcig cig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bzlog na de'i 'gro ba ni de yin par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-18: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-20: byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la the tshom ni 'tshal la mi spong na de ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:458b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-2: ji snyed du the tshom gyi sems bskyed pa de tsam du sangs rgyas mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-3: de bskal ba de snyed du byang chub ring du byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-6: yang gang zhig mos shing rtogs la the tshom 'tshal bar gyur na de'i lus gang gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ci tsam zhig tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-9: khyod kyis de'i lus dris pas ci zhig bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-13: 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang sgrag par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-14: slad ma'i skye bo rnams kyis thos na'ang skrag par 'gyur lags kyi bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-16: de'i lus gang gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ni dpag tshad khrir 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-17: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-18: gang des tshig ma bsrungs pa'i de'i lce ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-21: de'i lce ni dpag tshad stong yod par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-22: de la thong gshol sa ya phrag brgyas rmod par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-23: lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba sa ya phrag brgya 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459a-25: ci nas tshig de ma bsrungs pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459b-0: de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag dngangs @459b shing spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459b-1: gdong nas mchi ma zag par du ba'i bzhin gyis de'i tshes la 'gyel te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459b-2: 'gyel nas kyang thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig tu smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459b-5: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de 'dra ba'i tshig smras pas lus de 'dra ba'i rnam pa de lta bu myong bar 'gyur ba de'i ched du bdag cag 'gyod tshangs 'tshal lo; ;de nas der sems can gzhan dag gcig gdong las mchi ma zag par du zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459b-8: skye ba gzhan dag tu the tshom gang bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459b-10: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gang dag mthong ba de dag kyang dpang du gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459b-11: bdag cag gis las kyi sgrib pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar so sor bshags par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459b-13: nongs pa la nongs par so sor bshags shing nongs pa la nongs par mthong bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag gi nongs pa yongs su gzung du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:459b-17: khyed gang gi phyir nyes pa la nyes par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-2: gang nyes pa la nyes par mthong nas so sor 'chags pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la ni 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-5: 'khor 'di'i nang nas gang dag gis the tshom bskyed pa de dag kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-7: 'di 'dra ba'i sems can dmyal bar mchi bar 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-10: 'di'i nang nas gang dag gis the tshom bskyed pa de dag gis kyang so sor bshags shing so sor bor bas de dag gi myong bar 'gyur ba chung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-13: myong bar 'gyur ba ji tsam zhig tu chung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-16: de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro; ;spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang tsher bas grangs med dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-17: 'di ni mdor bsdus te smras pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gzhan dag la'ang ci nas so sor bshags pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460a-22: de lta bas ni rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-0: rigs kyi bu mos bdag gi lus 'di lta @460b bur 'gyur du 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-1: bdag gi tshor ba 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-2: mos nas kyang som nyi med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-3: the tshom med par bya ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-4: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su ma btang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-7: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su ma btang ba dang chos yongs su ma btang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-8: dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-11: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul yongs su ma btang ba des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-17: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-18: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-20: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos bstan pa mdzad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-21: gang gis dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba zhes bgyi ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs te de skad bka' stsal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-23: de bzhin gshegs pas dge 'dun du yongs su bstan pa ni gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:460b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-0: de bzhin gshegs pas phyir mi ldog pa la dge 'dun du yongs su bstan @461a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-3: byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa gang dag lags ba de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun pa la yang dag par gzhol ba ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-4: grangs su mchi ba'ang ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-7: gang dag bsam pa thag pa nas byang chub tu sems bskyed la; sems de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la yang dag par gzhol ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-8: de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun gyi grangs su 'gro ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-9: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-11: ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thabs mkhas pa dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-12: thabs mkhas pas don 'di yongs su bstan pa ngo mtshar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-13: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i me tog man d'a ra ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-14: mngon par gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-16: sems can thams cad kyang thabs mkhas pa 'dis chos ston par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-0: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ji ltar da lta na nga bzhin @461b du thabs mkhas pa 'dis chos ston par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-1: de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang pos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-2: bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog rnams kyis gtor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-5: sems can thams cad kyis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-7: slad ma'i skye bo rnams kyi ched dud bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-11: rigs kyi bu mo rgya mtsho'i dbus su son par gyur pa gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan na'ang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-12: des gdon mi za bar thos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-15: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-18: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs su lags kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang da byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-19: de nas sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dzambu'i klung gi gser gyi padma chen po 'dab ma bye ba brgya stong du ma yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:461b-23: 'od kyis phyogs bcu kun tu snang bar byed pa mngon du byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462a-0: @462a *// 'od des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462a-1: de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyis sbyan snga na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462a-2: dzambu'i gling gi gser gyi padma chen po 'dab ma brgya stong du ma yod pa 'od kyis phyogs bcu kun tu snang bar byed pa mngon du byung ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462a-3: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin khyim bdag gi cha byad kyis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs 'khor bzhi po de dag la byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462a-5: khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462a-6: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i phyir mngon par gtor cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462a-7: mngon par gtor cig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462a-8: de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis me tog de dag blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la gtor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462a-10: me tog de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbu'i steng gi dang thad na gdugs su 'dug par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462a-11: de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462a-13: gang gi slad dus chen po g-yos pa 'di byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi spyan sngar 'di @462b lta bu'i padma chen po 'di byung ba'i 'di su'i snga ltas lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-3: 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob pa'i ltas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-4: ltas 'dis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-7: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byin gyis brlabs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-11: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-15: bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig gis byin gyis brlabs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-16: 'on te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di dag gis kyang byin gyis brlabs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-22: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; kun dga' bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:462b-25: de lta bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa med pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-0: 'di 'bras bu sna tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya bar yang @463a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-2: 'di dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-3: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-11: rang sangs rgyas bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-12: 'di bdud slar btang ba bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-15: sangs rgyas bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-16: 'di pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-19: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-22: kun chub par byed na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-25: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-28: kun chub par bgyid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-31: gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-32: rigs kyi bu mo dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa de ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463a-33: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la the tshom ma za ba de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-0: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bzod @463b cing 'dod pa de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-1: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems ma zhum pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-2: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems yeng yeng por mi 'gyur ba de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-3: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rnam par mi rtog cing chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-5: de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-6: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mtshungs par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-7: 'di phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ye shes chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-10: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming yang mnyan par bgyi na thog ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-12: tha ma lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-17: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-19: gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa des 'khor ba las bskal pa du zhig bsnyil bar bgyis par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:463b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-0: gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming @464a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-1: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ye shes chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba thos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-2: thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ba des 'khor ba las bskal pa stong bsnyil bar byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-5: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de ji ltar blta bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-8: gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de nyid de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-9: de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gi mdun du padma kha dog sna tshogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-10: kha dog du ma yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-11: kha dog dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-12: 'dab ma bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa so sor byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-13: de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-14: rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-16: padma de dag blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-19: bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar bstan par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-20: de ltar rab tu dbye bar bgyi'o zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu de nas sil snyan thams @464b cad kyang ma bkrol bar sgra byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-1: spos thams cad kyi ngad kyang langs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-2: lha brgya stong mang po dag gis kyang lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-3: lha'i dzambu'i gling gi gser phye dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-4: lha'i me tog mand'a [?] rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-5: lha'i na bza' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-8: rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-10: 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; kun dga' bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-13: 'khor bzhi po 'di dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-17: dri za gang dag chos kyis rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-18: gang dag phyi ma'i dus na thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang ji ltar da lta na nga ston pa de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lhag chad med par ston par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-20: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-25: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-26: 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:464b-27: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-003:465a-2: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
